template.template: Template App HTTPS Cert - Jim Cronqvist
template.name: Template App HTTPS Cert - Jim Cronqvist

item.name: Cert expires in number of days
item.key: system.run["openssl s_client -host localhost -port 443 -showcerts < /dev/null 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -enddate -noout | sed -n 's/notAfter=//p' | xargs -I {} date +%s -d {} | xargs echo $(date +%s) | awk '{print ($2-$1)/3600/24}'"]
item.description: Shows the number of days until the HTTPS certificate will expire.

trigger.expression: {Template App HTTPS Cert - Jim Cronqvist:system.run["openssl s_client -host localhost -port 443 -showcerts < /dev/null 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -enddate -noout | sed -n 's/notAfter=//p' | xargs -I {} date +%s -d {} | xargs echo $(date +%s) | awk '{print ($2-$1)/3600/24}'"].last(0)}<14
trigger.name: HTTPS Certificate for {HOST.NAME} expires within 14 days

trigger.expression: {Template App HTTPS Cert - Jim Cronqvist:system.run["openssl s_client -host localhost -port 443 -showcerts < /dev/null 2>/dev/null | openssl x509 -enddate -noout | sed -n 's/notAfter=//p' | xargs -I {} date +%s -d {} | xargs echo $(date +%s) | awk '{print ($2-$1)/3600/24}'"].last(0)}<30
trigger.name: HTTPS Certificate for {HOST.NAME} expires within 30 days
